End Mini-Page 21093
Contact Us
Begin Mini-Page 21094
Legends Golf & Country Club
8600 Legends Boulevard, Fort Myers, FL 33912
Legends Golf & Country Club is located on Daniels Parkway (exit 131) just off I-75. Go west .5 miles to Fiddlesticks Blvd and turn left. Drive 1.3 miles to Legends Boulevard and turn right. Once you are through the gate the Clubhouse is located approximately .5 miles on the left. Legends is conveniently located near Fort Myers Beach and Sanibel Island as well as several shopping venues, including Bell Tower Shops and Gulf Coast Town Center.
Clubhouse
(239) 561-8740
Clubhouse (Fax)
(239) 561-8742
Golf Shop
(239) 561-7757
Golf Shop (Fax)
(239) 561-7767
End Mini-Page 21094
container

Begin Mini-Page 21075
End Mini-Page 21075
Host an Event
Begin Mini-Page 21076
Whether you are saying "I do" or celebrating a monumental life event, let Legends Golf & Country Club help create the perfect day!
Here at Legends we work hard not only to MEET your expectations, but to EXCEED them.  Our energetic team of banquet professionals and gourmet Chefs are prepared to organize your next function right down to the very last detail, leaving you and your guests to enjoy a fun filled day.
With the clubs indoor and outdoor venues, we can successfully host weddings, rehearsal dinners, corporate gatherings, bar mitzvahs, birthday celebrations, memorial receptions, and golf events. You will be surrounded by the tranquil beauty of our course, making it a perfect backdrop for incredible wedding photos. Picturesque windows along our entire Dining Room offer your guests spectacular views.
Let our team of culinary Chef's create the perfect "fine" dining experience with customized menus for your event.  Whether it's a plated entree or buffet style meal you won't be disappointed!
Legends promises to make your special day one you and your guests won't forget!
For more information, please contact Lisa Korf at
(239) 561-8740
ext.116 or email
[email protected]
.
End Mini-Page 21076
Start Tabs
3.4.1
Weddings
Special Events
Private Event Inquiries
Begin Mini-Page 21122
Congratulations on Your Engagement!
Here at Legends you won’t find wedding packages already put together…whether you are looking for a grand celebration or an intimate gathering of family and friends...we work with you to create the perfect backdrop for your special day or evening celebration. From a dramatic sunset cocktail hour to an outdoor reception under the stars...we deliver the wedding you’ve always imagined! Our understated décor makes it easy to reflect your unique style! Our picturesque windows along our entire Dining Room overlook the tranquil beauty of our course.  Our experienced, attentive staff will take care of every detail so you can enjoy every moment of your special day. With each wedding or banquet Legends hosts we take pride assisting in making every wedding a unique event.
Ceremony & Reception details you will want to keep in mind when considering the Legends:
Private country club setting
Seating in our Main Dining room for up to 200 guests
Indoor Wedding Receptions
Bridal Suite
Exceptional attention to detail
"Fine Dining Experience" the Legendary Way!
If you would like more information or to schedule a tour, please contact Lisa Korf at
(239) 561-8740
x116 or via email at
[email protected]
.
We look forward to making your special day one you and your guests won't forget!
End Mini-Page 21122
Begin Mini-Page 21123
Host your next Special Event at Legends.
Legends is one of the most desirable locations in Southwest Florida. We are minutes away from Fort Myers International Airport, Interstate 75, numerous shopping venues and several hotels.
We provide professional in-house catering with a powerful setting overlooking our waterfall pool and golf course. We work hard to live up to our reputation for dependability, promising not only to MEET your expectations, but to EXCEED them. Our energetic team of banquet professionals and gourmet Chef's are prepared to organize your next function right down to the very last detail. With the clubs indoor and outdoor venues, we can successfully host weddings, rehearsal dinners, corporate gatherings, bar mitzvahs, birthday celebrations, memorial receptions, and golf events.
Clubhouse Details:
A formal dining room that seats up to 200
Sweeping views of the golf course
Would you have it any other way, or the Legendary Way?
For more information or to schedule a tour, please contact Lisa Korf at
(239) 561-8740
ext. 116 or via email at
[email protected]
.
End Mini-Page 21123
Begin Mini-Page 21124
We'd Love To Hear From You!
When it comes to saying two little words that will wonderfully change your life forever and ever, a very special venue is needed to fully honor this most magical of days.
End Mini-Page 21124
